title: 8Bit Music Loops Vol 2
description: 8bit Music Loops Vol. 2 contains 18 high quality 8bit music loops (6 main tracks, plus 12 versions of them, including "No Drums" and faster versions). Music suitable for 8bit action, shoot 'em up, shooter and platform video games.
longDescription:
Preview: https://soundcloud.com/plasticsounddesign/sets/8bit-music-loops-vol-2-preview

8bit Music Loops Vol. 2 contains 18 high quality 8bit music loops (6 main tracks, plus 12 versions of them, including "No Drums" and faster versions). Music suitable for 8bit action, shoot 'em up, shooter and platform video games.

The main tracks included are:
- Action-Reaction 1:12 (Menu, Intro)
- At the Beginning 1:03 (Intro)
- Make Your Way 1:32 (Action)
- Enemy Assault 1:04 (Boss)
- Danger is Near 1:30 (Boss, Pre-Boss)
- Counterattack 1:07 (Action, Credits)

All tracks are perfectly seamless wave files at 44 KHz, 16 Bit and Stereo.
Please, let us know where you use any of these songs. We'll be glad to put a reference of your project in our web and social.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 18
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
Does music\audio loop: Yes
How many minutes of audio provided: 19:26
